TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IssuedSecurityTokenProvider extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Class IssuedSecurityTokenProvider Inherits SecurityTokenProvider Implements ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 表示已发布安全标记的标记提供程序。

span.span: Represents a token provider for issued security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存和重用从 方法返回的安全令牌时，必须要小心，因为当与令牌提供程序相关联的通道关闭时，安全令牌可能会无法使用。Care must be taken when caching and reusing security tokens that are returned from the method, because the security token might become unusable when the channel that the token provider is associated with is closed. 当请求的密钥为非对称类型时，安全令牌将不可用，并且当调用 方法时，将在模拟的上下文中运行线程。The security token becomes unusable when the requested key type is asymmetric and the thread is running under impersonated context when the method is called.

summary.span: 获取令牌核心。

span.span: Gets the token core.
The that represents the token core.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存和重用从 方法返回的安全令牌时，必须要小心，因为当与令牌提供程序相关联的通道关闭时，安全令牌可能会无法使用。Care must be taken when caching and reusing security tokens that are returned from the method, because the security token might become unusable when the channel that the token provider is associated with is closed. 当请求的密钥为非对称类型时，安全令牌将不可用，并且当调用 方法时，将在模拟的上下文中运行线程。The security token becomes unusable when the requested key type is asymmetric and the thread is running under impersonated context when the method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::IdentityVerifier ^ IdentityVerifier { System::ServiceModel::Security::IdentityVerifier ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::IdentityVerifier ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置标识验证程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity verifier.
The identity verifier.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int IssuedTokenRenewalThresholdPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置已颁发令牌的续订阈值百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the issued token renewal threshold percentage.

value.span: 已颁发令牌的续订阈值百分比。

span.span: The issued token renewal threshold percentage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此百分比控制该令牌提供程序与 SecurityTokenService 联系以获取新颁发令牌的频率。This percentage controls how often the token provider contacts the SecurityTokenService for a new issued token. 例如，如果该百分比为 90%，那么当已颁发令牌的有效间隔超过 90% 时，令牌提供程序将联系 SecurityTokenService。For example, if the percentage is 90 percent, then the token provider will contact the SecurityTokenService when 90 percent of the issued token's validity interval is over.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ IssuerAddress { System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发者的地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the issuer address.
The issuer address.

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发者绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the issuer binding.
The issuer binding.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuerChannelBehaviors As KeyedByTypeCollection(Of IEndpointBehavior)

summary.span: 获取颁发者的通道行为。

span.span: Gets the issuer channel behaviors.

value.span: 一个 ，包含该颁发者通道的行为。

span.span: A that contains the behaviors for the issuer channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将这些通道行为添加到 SecurityTokenService 的令牌提供程序所使用的通道中。These channel behaviors are added to the channel used by the token provider for the SecurityTokenService. 此集合的密钥是安全令牌服务的 URL。The key for this collection is the URL of the security token service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityKeyEntropyMode KeyEntropyMode { System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityKeyEntropyMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityKeyEntropyMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置密钥平均信息量模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the key entropy mode.
The key entropy mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是令牌提供程序与 SecurityTokenService 协商对称密钥以与已颁发的令牌一起使用时所使用的密钥平均信息量模式。This property is the key entropy mode used by the token provider when negotiating a symmetric key with the SecurityTokenService to use with the issued token.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MaxIssuedTokenCachingTime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存已颁发令牌的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum time that an issued token will be cached.

value.span: 一个 ，表示缓存已颁发令牌的最长时间。

span.span: A that represents the maximum time that an issued token will be cached.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息安全版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the message security version.
The message security version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含大量的属性，这些属性指定消息的不同组件的版本号。The contains numerous properties that specify version numbers of different components of a message.

summary.span: 获取或设置安全算法套件。

span.span: Gets or sets the security algorithm suite.
The security algorithm suite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 对象包含大量属性，这些属性指定要在特定条件下使用的安全算法。The object that is returned contains numerous properties that specify security algorithms to use in specific conditions. 它还描述该服务的各种安全功能。It also describes various security capabilities of the service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TokenRequestParameters As Collection(Of XmlElement)

summary.span: 获取令牌请求参数。

span.span: Gets the token request parameters.

value.span: 一个 XML 元素集合，表示令牌请求参数。

span.span: A collection of XML elements that represent the token request parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 XML 元素的一个集合，令牌提供程序将这些元素作为它发送给 SecurityTokenService 的 RequestSecurityToken 的一部分。This is a collection of XML elements that the token provider includes as part of the RequestSecurityToken it sends to the SecurityTokenService. 这些参数可以由客户端进行显式设置，或者可以从信赖方的安全策略中获取。These parameters can be set explicitly by the client or can be obtained from the relying party's security policy.
